Package model

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Sprite
      • model.Player
        • model.Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends model.Player
    Represents the features of enemy characters. Extends Player class and automates movements.
    Author:
    Roger
    See Also:
    Player

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy​(model.Coordinate p)
        Constructor for enemy class. Initializes velocity and acceleration. Sets the enemy sprite images and caption.
        Parameters:
        p - X and Y-coordinates at which the enemy character will be placed initially.

    • Method Detail

      • right

        public void right​()
        Automates the movement of the enemy to the right by changing the X-coordinates based on acceleration and velocity variables. Animates the sprite during movement by toggling the sprite image.
        Overrides:
        right in class model.Player

      • setVelocity

        public void setVelocity​(int v)

        Parameters:
        v - new velocity value.
